summary: After several locals are viciously murdered, a Louisiana sheriff starts to suspect he may be dealing with a werewolf.
cast: David Janssen|Barbara Rush|Bradford Dillman|John Beradino|Geoffrey Lewis|Royal Dano|John Davis Chandler|Claudia McNeil|Paul R. DeVille|Dan Priest|Robert Phillips|Serena Sande|George Sawaya|Dick Crockett|Sonny Klein|Emery Hollier|Teddy Airhart
title: Moon of the Wolf
